attributes.action: Request to the Queen that Parliament be dissolved with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parliament has shown itself to be morally bankrupt. In order to salvage what little democracy we have left, this country needs a new and clear mandate for parliament including a re-election of all members. Part of the process should include the much promised referendum on our future in Europe - a referendum that has been promised by the majority of Members.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
